item.title: Yūsuf va Zulaykhā min taṣnīf-i Ḥaz̤rat Mawlānā ʻAbd al-Raḥmān-i Jāmī.
notes: Paper; dark cream-color unpolished, coarse laid paper with no visible chain-lines or watermarks; severely worm damaged; no borders; black ink with some rubrication.
Nastaʻliq; 15 lines in written area 18 x 11 cm.
Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M40.
Dark brown leather binding; text partially disbound; poor condition.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
medium: 135 leaves (15 lines), paper : bound ; 23 x 15 cm
other_title: يوسف و زليخا من تصنيف حضرت مولانا عبد الرحمان جامي.

subject: manuscripts, persian
india
washington (d.c.)
title: Yūsuf va Zulaykhā min taṣnīf-i Ḥaz̤rat Mawlānā ʻAbd al-Raḥmān-i Jāmī.
description: Manuscript. Persian. Title from colophon. Name of scribe not indicated. Written in India. Paper; dark cream-color unpolished, coarse laid paper with no visible chain-lines or watermarks; severely worm damaged; no borders; black ink with some rubrication. Nastaʻliq; 15 lines in written area 18 x 11 cm. Folio 1b-136b. Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M40. Dark brown leather binding; text partially disbound; poor condition. Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
other_title: يوسف و زليخا من تصنيف حضرت مولانا عبد الرحمان جامي.
